column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////What exactly can you not brag about in this place??  The only other thing I wanted to do when I came to Chicago
column2: other than go to my concert
column3: was eat Chicago style deep dish and this place seriously delivered.  It really was a no-brainer since it's advertised so many times on Food Network shows
column4: etc. on where to eat in Chicago so I was a bit worried about the touristy feel of the place.  No problem.  It may be where the tourists go
column5: but it was also quite obvious that it's also where the locals go.
